yes, any 1 hit kills are a bit too un-balancing
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: doomlordx <doomlordx@...> 
  To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2003 1:24 PM
  Subject: [gladiator] Abilities for Orcs and Archers


  Suggestions so far are good, I like Ethereal Arrow, but here's a 
  weird Archer ability I thought of.

  Doom Arrow - A seemingly normal arrow is fired, but it is cursed so 
  that it will instantly slay the first enemy it hits. (IE: normal 
  arrow, but always insta-death)

  I think it sounds cool, but it might unbalance the game. Also might 
  need to change explanation.

  For the Orcs:

  Berserk - An Orc with enough power can bring upon itself rage in 
  which it may destroy anyting that stands in it's way. (Like Charge, 
  but kills everything it hits, including your own side so be careful)

  I'd appreciate feedback, although neither of these is incredibly 
  likely to reach Openglad Enhanced or Gladiator: Beyond Freedom...



  The Gladiator Mailing List


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
